scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json users-app-vue3/node_modules users-app-vue3/package-lock.json edit-user-app-vue3/node_modules edit-user-app-vue3/package-lock.json shell-vue2/node_modules shell-vue2/package-lock.json dist
scripts.install:all: npm run install:remote1 && npm run install:remote2 && npm run install:shell
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:remote1" "npm run dev:remote2" "npm run dev:shell"
scripts.build: npm run build:remote1 && npm run build:remote2 && npm run build:shell
scripts.copy:dist: mkdirp dist && copyfiles -u 1 "users-app-vue3/dist/**/*" dist/users-app-vue3 && copyfiles -u 1 "edit-user-app-vue3/dist/**/*" dist/edit-user-app-vue3 && copyfiles -u 1 "shell-vue2/dist/**/*" dist/shell-vue2
scripts.deploy:all: npm run clean && npm install && npm run install:all && npm run build && npm run copy:dist && npm run deploy
